settings.general.description: All of these settings only need to be set by the host. All joining farmers will use the host's settings
settings.general.true-random.label: Use unseeded random generator
settings.general.true-random.tooltip: When unchecked, randomizer will use seeded pseudorandom generator. When checked will use unseeded random generator.
settings.general.reset-keybind.label: Reroll Reset Keybind
settings.general.reset-keybind.tooltip: Allows the host to reset the number of available rerolls back to their max amount
settings.general.force-unique.label: Force Unique Orders
settings.general.force-unique.tooltip: When possible, will guarantee that as none of the new options are the previous options.
settings.board.description1: These settings are pages for individual boards based on mods you have loaded.
settings.board.description2: By default, rerolls are disabled and they refresh every Monday.
settings.board.allow-reroll.label: Allow Rerolls
settings.board.allow-reroll.tooltip: When checked, allows this board to be rerolled
settings.board.infinite-rerolls.label: Infinite Rerolls
settings.board.infinite-rerolls.tooltip: When checked, allows this board to be rerolled infinitely
settings.board.max-rerolls.label: Max Daily Rerolls
settings.board.max-rerolls.tooltip: The number of daily rerolls the team has shared across them per day for this board
settings.board.schedule.label: Reroll Schedule
settings.board.schedule.tooltip: This board will automatically reroll at the start of all checked days
